pr_title: Save error trace segment even that segment will abandoned by sampling mechanism

timeline.message: Save some error trace segment, event this segment abandoned by server side trace sampling mechanism.
Support forceSaveErrorSegment config to control force save some error segment.

timeline.author: wu-sheng
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -78,4 +78,12 @@
 
     @Getter
     private final String configPath = "meter-receive-config";
+
+    /**
+     * When open sampling, true means some error segment will be saved, even that segment will abandoned by server side trace sampling mechanism.
+     * false means all segment saved condition by server side trace sampling mechanism.
+     */
+    @Setter
+    @Getter
+    private boolean forceSaveErrorSegment = true;

timeline.body: This will be always true in default, as `forceSaveErrorSegment == true`. I think you mischanged this?

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
* When open sampling, true means some error segment will be saved, even that segment will abandoned by server side trace sampling mechanism.
* false means all segment saved condition by server side trace sampling mechanism.
* Sample the trace segment if the segment has span(s) tagged as error status, and ignore the sampleRate configuration.
